akn:content.akn:p: An insurer may acquire investments in investment pools that invest only in:
For an investment in an investment pool to be qualified under this chapter, the investment pool shall not:

The limitations of § 31-1373.03(a) shall not apply to an insurer’s investment in an investment pool; provided, that an insurer shall not acquire an investment in an investment pool under this section if, as a result of and after giving effect to the investment, the aggregate amount of investments held by the insurer under this section:
For an investment in an investment pool to be qualified under this chapter, the manager of the investment pool shall:
The pooling agreement for each investment pool shall be in writing and shall provide that:

Distributions under subsection (e)(5) of this section shall be calculated net of all applicable fees and expenses of the investment pool. The pooling agreement shall provide that the pool manager may distribute to a participant, at the discretion of the pool manager:
